archimate:BusinessObject.name: EIRA Architecture Building Block
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: DESCRIPTION: An EIRA Architecture Building Block is a requirement of an intermediate level of granularity, in alignment with at least one EIF principle, formulated as an agreed normative statement in functional terms on a legal, organisational, semantic, or technical attribute of a To-Be European Public Service. An EIRA ABB might encapsulate several interoperability aspects
